Text: My life has been the same for the last 5 years.@ My name is Gregory and I work as a janitor in a concert hall@ That day started as usual. I was washing the scene for some death metal group and after that…
Everything changed.
*Talking on the phone* He… WHAT?!?!?@No, I hear you, I mean…@He will be alright in a week or something, right?@A MONTH?!?!?@Listen, there must be something we can…@Hello? HELLO??
Listen, there must be something we can… Hello? HELLO??@Shit.@Hey, you.
Yeah, you.@Can you scream really loud and scary?
I… I used to cry a lot as a kid… My brothers often bullied me.
Meh… It’ll do. Come here.
What the…

Cool, right?!@Our soloist has got into an accident and now you will replace him. I'll introduce you to the band. We need to do a lot of work so you won’t disappoint me. And be sure. You don’t wanna see me disappointed.
*Gulp*
Ok, see you later!
Wait buddy
Became a star and don't know what to do? Don't piss, now I'll tell you how it all works.
As frontman of the death metal band, you'll need to make a bunch of important choices.
Your choices will affect your performance.
You can't eat applause, so the band should always be with money.
Stress always haunts the stars. Try not to get cranky.
Nobody needs you without fans, so maintain your level of popularity.
You can make a choice by pressing one of your fingers.
Clicking on a human finger you will act just like normis.
By pressing on the awesome, metal skeletons finger, you will release your dark essence to perform your tasks.
But be careful, you never know in advance what exactly will happen with your choice, so think before you act.
Well, that's all for now. The concert is coming soon, try not to break up the band until then!
